hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Los Angeles Harbor Hotel
hotels.title: Coastal Los Angeles Escape in Downtown San Pedro's Little Italy District
hotels.description: Nestled on Southern California's Palos Verdes Peninsula is the coastal town of San Pedro, and the Crowne Plaza Los Angeles Harbor Hotel, an IHG Hotel. Right in the heart of Little Italy, and home to the Port of Los Angeles, San Pedro is buzzing with culture, history and laidback coastal vibes. Visit the oldest lighthouse in California, Port Fermin, explore the abundance of art galleries and indulge your love of food by discovering some of the best foodie hangouts in LA.

seo.title: Hotel a San Pedro - Stati Uniti Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a San Pedro, United States con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
